scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:react && npm run install:functions
scripts.copyfiles: copyfiles -u 1 "src/static/**/*" build && copyfiles -u 1 "src/views/**/*" build && copyfiles -u 1 "src/.env" build
scripts.build: rimraf build && npm run build:server && npm run build:assets && npm run copyfiles
scripts.dev: npm run watch "npm run build:server && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node build/server/init.js"
scripts.prod: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node build/server/init.js
